text: David Warren "Dave" Ellefson (born on 12 November 1964 in Jackson, Minnesota, United States) is an American bassist. He was a member of the band Megadeth. Along with Dave Mustaine, he is one of the founding members of the band. He currently lives in Scottsdale, Arizona. He has also played with Soulfly, Avian, Temple of Brutality, F5, Killing Machine, Ministry, Hail! and Altitudes & Attitudes. == Other websites == * Official website * David Ellefson on loudwire.com Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:American bass guitarists Category:American Christians Category:Musicians from Minnesota Category:Bassists Category:Megadeth members
title: David Ellefson
